title: Is it ok to ask a Sheikh about the fatwa of another Sheikh by mentioning his name? Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: the second most important thing than this fatwa is it is totally impolite or let us say in inappropriate to ask a sheikh about the fatwa of another sheikh and giving his name this is totally inappropriate because you are insulting the you are coating so either he's wrong or i'm wrong someone is wrong someone is and i'm not sure whether he said such a fatwa or not
